series.name: Active Listings in Georgia
series.description: This chart shows the number of active real estate listings in Georgia.

series.name: Median Days on Market in Georgia
series.description: This chart displays the median number of days that properties stay on the market in Georgia.

series.name: Active Listing Count Month-Over-Month in Georgia
series.description: The count of active single-family and condo/townhome listings for a given market during the specified month (excludes pending listings).
